subject: Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: Shigeru Tsukiyama, a Buddhist priest, has come 7,500 miles from Tokyo for the prestigious Bassmaster Classic tournament, which pays $500,000 and potentially more in endorsements to the winner.
snippet: Shigeru Tsukiyama, a Buddhist priest, has come 7,500 miles from Tokyo for the prestigious Bassmaster Classic tournament, which pays $500,000 and potentially more in endorsements to the winner.
